ğŸ·ï¸ Check tags
git tag

ğŸš€ Deploying new versions:
git tag 1.2.2-prod && git push origin 1.2.2-prod  # ğŸš€ Deploy version 1.2.2
git tag 1.2.3-prod && git push origin 1.2.3-prod  # ğŸš€ Deploy version 1.2.3

âª Reverting to previous version:
git tag 1.2.2-prod-revert && git push origin 1.2.2-prod-revert  # âª Rollback to 1.2.2-prod

ğŸ“ˆ Scaling up the deployment:
git tag 1.2.2-prod-scale-10 && git push origin 1.2.2-prod-scale-10  # ğŸ“ˆ Scale to 10 instances
